caption.p: The AC impedance spectra of ( A) RDC/PAAK/KOH -3 h with various concentration KOH solution of ( a) 2 M, ( b) 4 M, ( c) 6 M, ( d) 8 M, and ( e) 10 M; ( B) RDC/PAAK/KOH (8 M) with various soaking times of ( a) 1 h, ( b) 2 h, ( c) 3 h, ( d) 4 h, ( e) 5 h, and ( f) 6 h for alkaline polymer electrolytes; ( C) ionic conductivities of RDC/PAAK/KOH alkaline polymer electrolytes with various concentrations of KOH and soaking time.
